text: Kaadu tama munaafiqhiin table waqdi ken xagarih maqaane kot meqeeh, tassakooteh, kaadu usun yaaben ken tekkek, ken yab ankacissah, ken lubbitte iimaan kee kassi boolak gexxaamah hununuh gidaaral kelsime guruumudih innah gacak, usun conxô gibdah ummaan xongoló sinnil raddem yakkalen, Nabiyow! Usun nummah ku qaduwwik atu keenik daccarsim (cibbarsim). Yalli isi racmatak ken yayxaarayik usun tirtô gitak mannal makkootaanaa
